data.message: Hello , I have a huge problem my old facebook (I've delete it three month ago) is still active can you make something please ?

replies.message: Hi Nathan. We don't allow impostor accounts on Facebook. If you believe someone is pretending to be you please report it at: http://on.fb.me/SIWGu2 - Kristen
No that's not my request nobody is onmy account but I can't delete it !
hello my old account has been blocked about 2 years ago and i dont know why !! is there any way to get it back ?
j'ai le mm probleme!!! c'est le site?

Hi Omar. Perhaps you mean that your account was suspended. You'll be able to get back into your account once you complete our security check. After you get back into your account, please review these security tips: http://on.fb.me/SJSWIJ -Leigh

Hi Nathan. Sorry we misinterpreted your question earlier. Can you please try to delete your account again through this link? http://on.fb.me/1ozBZe5 

If this is not working for you, do you mind submitting a bug report? http://on.fb.me/1ozBZe1 Thanks for your patience. -Leigh
